othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Operational procedures, calibration standards, maintenance and safety instructions for the Cullet Preheater system used at the Villotta glass plant.

othermeta.name: entities
othermeta.content: Cullet Preheater;Temperature Sensor;Energy Recovery Unit;Safety Interlock;Maintenance Checklist;Villotta Plant
